directions: Combine beans, hot sauce, ranch dressing, garlic, and oil in a food processor. Pulse, adding water as necessary to improve consistency until desired consistency is reached, 8 to 10 pulses.
Top with crumbled blue cheese and a drizzle of more hot sauce. Serve with Snack Factory(R) Pretzel Crisps(R) and assorted vegetables for dipping.
Top with blue cheese and an optional drizzle of hot sauce. Serve with Snack Factory(R) Pretzel Crisps(R) and assorted veggie sticks like carrots and celery.
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained
6 tablespoons Buffalo wing sauce (such as Frank's® RedHot)
1/4 cup water, or as needed for consistency
1 (7.2 ounce) package Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
Assorted, fresh vegetable sticks cut up for dipping
title: JARRIE's Hot Wing Hummus with Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisp® Dippers
